column2: Rikyt, 55-64 Male  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: Used on my shoulders because of rotor cup torn so much it can not be repaired. In pain most of the time. I tried Solonpas patch at night and it has really helped me sleep. Don't leave on to long or on same spot because it will burn the skin,but I left it on for 15 hours. They say 8 maxium. COSTCO has the best price and it's in coupon book for this week.8-18-12

column2: Barrett, 55-64 Female  on Treatment for 1 to less than 2 years (Patient)
column9: Used on sore feet (tendinitis),  bursitis shoulder, and hip pain.  Love this product

column2: tamside, 45-54 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I have chronic lymes disease and suffer from extreme joint/muscle and nerve pain. I have used many patches, but was lured to this one by the 12 hour claim. It is by far the most effective.

column2: 65-74 Male  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: While the tapes were fairly simple to use, their effectiveness left me with very much to be desired!  I would not purchase this product again for my personal use but I might recommend it to someone in my family if they were not in too much pain!

column2: pmtgrt, 55-64 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
swi nk, 25-34 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: went to the dr. for severe nerve pain in my shoulder/neck- gave me pain killers. I found these patches in the pharmacy while waiting. Slapped one on in the car and by the tim i got home my pain level went from a 8/9 to about a 1/2- will never use anything else for nerve or muscle aches.

column2: My son, 7-12 Male  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Caregiver)
column9: My son has Juvinial Arthritis in his back He would cry himself to sleep at night.He has been using the Salonpas for a while and he is felling great.Nothing else worked and we have been dealing with the pain for 4 year.Now he goes to bed without the tears.This is a awsome product.

column2: 45-54 Male  on Treatment for 2 to less than 5 years (Patient)
column9: They work  GREAT. No side-effects.Do not applyon the exact same spot too often or can irritateskin. I buy them at Costco and the price difference as opposed to the drug chain stores is a big deal. I highly recommend.

column2: Mimi C, 55-64 Female  on Treatment for 10 years or more (Patient)
column9: I have fibro with muscle spasms and occasional stabs of pain out of the blue.  These patches work well, usually for at least two hours - sometimes for 8-10. (Just don't apply one on your skin after you've put Capsaicin cream earlier - too hot!)

column2: LazyDazey, 45-54 Female  on Treatment for 5 to less than 10 years (Patient)
column9: These things are great! And cheap! Been using them for years. Just don't forget you have one on and bathe with it gets way too hot!
It has given me most comfort at night whilst sleeping

column9: I use these small adhesive pads on muscle spasms in my back and legs.  It works great for a few hours.  better than many muscle rubs!
